content.question: The artist who created the Scenes from the Apocalypse chose imagery that was intended to elicit which of the following responses?

choices.label: Strong appreciation of the reigning monarchs and their divine right to rule
Deeper understanding of the relevance of biblical stories to the era in which viewers lived
A feeling of connection to biblical events through the inclusion of local saints
A renewed devotion to the family because of the scenes of domestic life

content.answer: Deeper understanding of the relevance of biblical stories to the era in which viewers lived
